title: AGRICULTURAL ENGINEERING/TECHNOLOGY
utme_requirements:
Five (5) SSC credit passes in Mathematics, English Language, Physics and any two (2) of the following:

Biology/Agricultural Science

Chemistry

Technical Drawing

Basic Electronics/Basic Electricity

Auto Mechanics

Metal Work

Further Mathematics

Food and Nutrition

Geography
subjects: Mathematics and Physics/Technical Drawing, Chemistry or any two (2) Science subjects.

title: AGRICULTURAL TECHNOLOGY
utme_requirements:
Five (5) SSC credit passes in Biology/Agricultural Science,

Mathematics and any three (3) of the following:

Geography,

Food and Nutrition,

Economics,

Technical Drawing,

English Language,

Physics,

Chemistry,

Nigerian Language,

Home Economics.

At least 'O' Level credit passes in English Language and Chemistry are compulsory.
subjects: Biology/Agricultural Science, Chemistry and any other Science subject

title: ANIMAL HEALTH AND PRODUCTION TECH.
utme_requirements:
Five (5) SSC credit passes in Biology/Agricultural Science,

Mathematics and any three (3) of the following:

Geography,

Food and Nutrition,

Economics,

Technical Drawing,

English Language,

Physics,

Chemistry,

Nigerian Language,

Home Economics.
subjects: Biology/Agricultural Science, Chemistry and any other Science subject

title: COMPUTER SCIENCE
utme_requirements:
Five (5) SSC credit passes in Mathematics, a basic science and three (3) other subjects chosen from the following:

Economics,

Geography,

Government/History,

Further Mathematics,

Physics,

Chemistry,

Biology/Agricultural Science.

English Language,

Typewriting,

'O' Level credit passes in English Language and Physics is compulsory.
subjects: Mathematics and any two (2) of Geography, Physics, Economics or Chemistry.

title: FISHERIES TECHNOLOGY
utme_requirements:
Five (5) 'O' Level credit passes in Biology/Agricultural Science,

Mathematics and any three (3) of the following:

Geography,

Food and Nutrition,

Economics,

Technical Drawing,

English Language,

Physics,

Chemistry,

Nigerian Language,

Home Economics.

'O' Level credit passes in English Language and Chemistry are compulsory.
subjects: Biology/Agricultural Science and two (2) of Physics, Chemistry, Mathematics and Economics

title: HOME & RURAL ECONOMICS
utme_requirements:
Five (5) SSC credit passes in any three (3) of the following:

Government,

Business Methods,

Economics/Commerce,

Religious Knowledge,

Any Nigerian Language,

Geography,

Bookkeeping and Principles of Accounts

History,

Clothing and Textile,

plus 'O' Level credit passes in English Language and Mathematics.
subjects: Biology, Agricultural Science and any other subject.

title: PRODUCTION TECH.
utme_requirements:
Five (5) SSC credit passes in Biology/Agricultural Science,

Mathematics and any three (3) of the following:

Geography,

Food and Nutrition,

Economics,

Technical Drawing,

English Language,

Physics,

Chemistry,

Nigerian Language,

Home Economics.

At least 'O' Level credit passes in English Language and Chemistry are compulsory.
subjects: Biology/Agricultural Science, Chemistry and any other Science subject

title: SCIENCE LABORATORY TECHNOLOGY
utme_requirements:
Five (5) SSC credit passes in Mathematics and two (2) of Physics,

Biology/Agricultural Science/Health Science, Chemistry,

and two (2) other subjects from Technical Drawing, Metal or Wood Work, Basic Electricity, Geography, Further Mathematics, and Fine Arts.

'O' Level credit pass in each of the three (3) Basic Science subjects - Biology, Chemistry, Physics and a 'O' Level credit pass in English Language is compulsory.
subjects: Any three (3) of Mathematics, Biology/Agricultural Science or Physics

title: STATISTICS
utme_requirements:
Five (5) SSC credit passes in Mathematics, Basic Science and any three (3) of the following:

Economics,

Geography,

Government/History,

Further Mathematics,

Physics,

Chemistry,

Biology/Agricultural Science.

English Language,

Typewriting,

'O' Level credit passes in English Language and Physics are compulsory.
subjects:
Any of the three (3): 
1. Economics/  
     Commerce
2. History/Government
3. CRS/IS
4. Mathematics
